 CodeFii v2
                                 
 Usage  php fii [command]
 
     --quotes                Generate Random Beautiful  quotes from Codefii
     --create               Generate Controller.
     --serve                Display your project on the browser using the defualt port
     --serve --port<number> Display your project on the browser using any port of your choice
